prompt:
Patient: Hello?

Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Alex Alves?

Patient: Yes.

Nurse: Thank you for confirming. Could you please provide your date of birth for verification purposes?

Patient: Whatever, August fifth nineteen sixty seven, Why are you calling me anyways?

responses.gpt4: Thank you for your verification, Mr. Alves. I'm calling about your upcoming colonoscopy with Dr. Meredith Bailey that's been scheduled for August 17 at 10:00 AM. I would like to ensure you have everything you need in preparation for the procedure. Is this a convenient time to review some details? Also, how has your day been so far?
responses.our_model: Thank you for confirming your date of birth, Mr. Alves. I'm calling to discuss your upcoming colonoscopy on August 17 at 10:00 AM. Is this a good time to talk?
